content.detailedDescription:
Just before 7:00 pm this evening (november 13, 2010) my wife and i heard our downstairs neighbor calling us to the back yard. my wife went out and then yelled for me to come outside quickly because there were "ufos out here.."

i ran out to the back balcony and looked up to see several bright orange orbs in the sky looking towards the ocean and the direction of catalina island. i quickly ran back into our apartment and grabbed my point-and-shot digital camera.

i returned to the balcony and was able to record the last 2 and a half minutes of the sighting while the last orb brightened for a last time and then faded to a dark gray and continued on it's course.

i personally saw two bright orange orbs, my wife saw three (because she went outside first) and our neighbor said she saw 7-8 orange orbs, all in a line across the sky.

i am not sure how far away the orbs were from us, but they were unlike anything i have ever seen. they seemed to burn from inside, but it wasn't what seemed to be propelling them.

they did not fall through the sky like burning debris, but like a vehicle moving on a set course from west to east across the sky.

while it can't be seen because of the video quality, the orbs continued along their eastern course as dark gray orbs, each with a very dim orange glow inside.

included with this report is several graphics i made this evening right after the event:
1. a time-chart of the path of the one orange orb i was able to videotape.
2. a map showing our field of view and the flight path of the orange orbs

the video is unedited.
content.summary: String of orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was in lincoln village in austin. i noticed strings of webbing float in the wind. then i noticed that trees and streetlights were covered in them. i got in my car to drive home. i then noticed 7- 10 objects that were emitting white light behind cloud cover. these lights in the clouds were moving very quickly in back and forth sweeping motions over long distances. i pulled over to observe them more. i do not think they were spotlights because the amount of light emitted from these objects were dimmed as it moved through thicker cloud coverage. i got in my car and returned home.
content.summary: 7- 10 objects that were emitting white light behind cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: we were bbq'ing in my back yard and i spotted the object in the northern sky moving s.E. i thought it may be a satellite but i am very familiar with the way those show in the night sky. it was very bright and moving fast with no sound. midway through the viewing what looked like a shooting star appeared directly under it. the shooting star seemed to be more like a missle that was shot at the bright object and missed. a couple minutes after that the object slowed down drastically and changed color from an intense white to a dull red color. we lost sight of the object behind the mountain and about 3 min later what seemed to be two military f-16 fighters appeared in the same area that the object traveled. we could clearly hear these two jets and they had normal blinking aircraft lights. after the occurence we really could'nt believe what we had just seen especially when the jets showed up. i believe that what we saw was advanced aircraft or something not from here. the missle type object is what made us really wonder.
content.summary: Bright glow moving at high rate of speed, then turned red as slowed down.

content.detailedDescription: At around the date and time listed above i *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) was stationed at the **(name of business deleted--cms/sg) allong with onother security officer for cabage night duty. we were in seporat cars one at the club house and i was at the road entrance.  in the time of 01:00 nd 02:00 i was talking to the other officer on the radio and all of the suden i saw this bright red light in my rear view.  as i attempted to relay the info to the other officer radio and cell service was lost.  the other officer responded to the road way whare i was and we got out of the cars to take a look.  it looked like 2 balls of fire speading fast tward the ground.  they were odd though because they were prfectley round.  we decided to get into our cars and head down the mountain because our first thought was that it was a plain crashing.  as we raced down the mountain we were in and out of radio contact with eachother.  the objects were going too fast to be a jet. we chased the objects down themountian whare we lost sight of them by the lake.  we stopped at the bridge to the island and could not hear or see anything.  if they were to hit the water in the area that we arived at there would be a disturbance but the water was as smooth as glass.  we reported to our dispatch that we were at the island when we were able to reestablish radio contact.  no sound or other light was observed from the objects.  we did not make a offical report on the incedent because we did not want to sound crazy. the officers patroling the island did not see what we had saw nor did the supervisor who was standing on the docks that look over most of the lake.  we just could not understand what could look like 2 bright fire balls and not make a sound or explode or evenmake a nois whare we antisipated the inpact by the path that it was taking.  a few patrons at the local bar noticed the objects but they would not have bean credable witnesses.  it was just tough to explain and still is.  the other officer and i have left the sagamore and have not talked about this sence.
content.summary: 2 balls of bright red light one fallowing the other.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving down highway 401 eastbound near trenton ontario i noticed a falling star or meteor streaking south to north directly in front of me or so i thought. but also noticed the light did not diminish, or fade and after a long streak across the sky it made a sharp 45 degree turn and traveled another 5 seconds and disappeared. it did not burn out or fade just vanished! i travel this road every night doing a run in a tractor trailer from cambridge ontario to kingston ontario and back. about the same time and on the same highway. i have noticed a similar event two weeks prior at 4:00 am heading west. i dismissed it as being tired and my eyes perhaps playing tricks on me. 

this particular event the sky was perfectly clear, and was directly in front of me, in plain sight. i also noticed on your website sightings over the north tip of new york state, a stone throw from my location. 

i immediately picked up my blackberry and messaged my wife to inform her of what i saw, hoping she was still up. also the message would would document the time at 1:14 am. i simply stated " i think i just saw my first ufo, or maybe second!" 

both our interests have been with the paranormal and in ufology, and our eyes are more into the stars than ever.
content.summary: Appeared as a falling star

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 7:35 pm  over the horizon in the south west, two lights appeared very close to the horizon, changing color, size and shape.  the colors ranged from red, white, blue, and amber/orange.  about the same time a chopper from the north (unidentified) approached; the lights diminished and seem to vanish.  a few minutes later as the chopper retreated to the south, the lights appeared again.  they were very bright, but not at the same time.  it seem to be a game of lights between them.  others began to appear later around 7:55 pm towards the north/northwest carrying the same characteristics.  they seem to stay in the same position for some time.  they formed an arc or triangle at different points on the sky.  one being on the horizon, the other directly above it and then one over the city lights in the west.  more started to appear and there was a total of 5 flashing and become bright changing from the colors of white-red-orange.  this happened about 8:20- 8:30 pm.  then as they began to ascend higher, they solidified into a low orange color, and "glided" away.  they formed a noticeable arc in the sky.  when i saw them i knew that they werent planes or weather balloons with flares as most of the experts would state.  i know what planes look like, i see them every night.  this has been happening for the past two days, but the real changes occured the 13th between the hours of 7:35- 8:40 pm.
i was excited to verify that my feelings about them were correct and able to see them for the first time instead of watching from others.  i wasn't even thinking or looking for them, i was feeding my cat when i noticed them.  
i'm not concerned with their agenda, because we humans have no real control, only our government which continues to deny everything.  they have better technology and as far as i'm concerned they will do what they want regardless of our desires.  i just wish that the government would lie so much in a silly way with "weather balloons, children's balloons, rc helicopter, military flares, unamed rocketeer, etc.."  don't they know that most people are tired of that?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like object (sometimes) changing shape and color, steady and then moving sometimes in a zig-zag.

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us were driving north on us 25 & we both saw a bright (very bright) object hovering in the sky.  we saw it because of it's brightness.  
i had no idea as to what this could be--i've never seen anything like it.  it was stationary in the sky--no motion at all.
  my primary emotion was curiosity.  i said to the driver "i think that must be a ufo."  we both joked about me finally seeing one.  i immediately got on a cell phone to call a friend.
     not sure how it disappeared--we were driving past a stand of tall trees & when we drove past the trees, it was gone.
content.summary: Ball of light

content.detailedDescription: This wednesday morning the sunrise was beautiful and i took more than several pictures for several minutes, panning across the sky in them. the first three north pictures contain a white line in the sky that appears to have two spheres within it or along it, one bigger and one smaller and in different positions in each picture - although the white line appears to be in the same position in the sky in each picture. each attached image is a cropped of the original, two rotated to compensate for the unaligned frame and house - no other adjustments were made to the originals. why this appears to truly be an unidentified flying object, by definition, is that two of the pictures had a twist in the frame relative to the horizontal line of the house top. when that was compensated for with software, the white line-sphere object appears to be in the same position in the sky! what's different in the images is the amount of light the camera let in, the positions of the spheres of the line, and the slight differences in the frame of each due to photography only being a hobby of mine and i couldn't crop them exactly the same. even with my intermediate knowledge of digital imaging, i realize that it is unlikely that a camera anomaly caused these images as the white line-sphere was in a different position and angle in each original, yet rotated and cropped to the same position which is more likely of an actual object in sky there. the three pictures span 17 seconds. another picture of the north taken almost 4 minutes later did not have the object in it. i did not see the object with my eyes at the time, i noticed it when i downloaded the images from my camera to computer two days later. these are all cropped images yet all are at 100 percent resolution of the camera image density.
content.summary: White line-spheres object over st. louis sunrise in 3 different pictures

content.detailedDescription:
On thursday, nov 11  i woke up at 3:11 am and was having a hard time sleeping so i stayed in bed looking out through our panoramic window at the stars. 

all of a sudden an object that looked like a falling star stopped in mid air. it was a huge oval orange hue object with bright lights around the center. 

i woke my partner up and said "look [first name removed cms/dr] an ufo" and he looked at it and then the object moved vertically towards the east. i ran to the window in the kitchen but it was gone.

i have never seen anything so big in the sky and it was so beautiful!
it was surreal!

i went back to bed and saw a shooting star and then i fell asleep.
content.summary: Oval orange bright light moves down vertically from sky then moves horizontally

content.detailedDescription: After hearing about the event near richmond va. i realized i have seen at least two objects in the night sky for the past week of nov. 8 through the 12th near where i live. this one appears to be imitating a star and it stays just below the small dipper constellation through out the night in the eastern sky after 10:30 pm. it also moves slowly in a zigzag and circular or oval pattern in a small area. i want to know really what it is. i say craft, because it could be alien or human. i just don't know and want answers. the other one, not filmed, was only around 1 night on wednesday 11-10-2010. it was out that night for only 40 minutes in the north west close to the horizon. about the video. my dv camera is about 8 years old and doesn't have night vision, but i was using night shot mode with low lux enabled. the only editing i did was clip the shaky movement out after the camera would try to focus on the intense bright blue, white and blinking light. the blur around the object is from me zooming all the way in very fast. my feelings of the object is: i get very fixated and intrans-ed by it. i feel like i could some how communicate with the object. very weird feeling. i am happy that i have finally seen one of these things with my own eyes, but at the same time a little scared too. i have also noticed 2 other star-like objects next to small dipper constellation. they blink same way but with less intensity. so, the ufo i have filmed and the other 2 star-like objects would make a much bigger triangle shape.
content.summary: Ufo flying and hovering and emitting mainly white and blue light.

content.detailedDescription:
Well me and a friend went out from our computer rooms laughing and joking and all that discussing about stuff about work. we went on the porch to smoke a cigarettes. well we always look at the sky cause we watch the spartan planes for students fly over all the time and talk about stuff. we saw a hawk after a spartan plane but i noticed a blink oval object going across the sky. now it was during the day the sun was shining so i was assuming it was a plane and not a bird but it was way above near the cloud lines. it kept going on a straight path slowly just blinking with a strobe like with it.....But what caught me off guard was it stopped and ziz zagged fast in a pyramid formation fast and then went back onto its course it was going and it just vanished...It was like it slowly cloaked itself after that formation. i personally don't believe in all that but when i saw that i about fell off the porch and drop my cigerate. i well tell you this i can't explain what i saw but i know for a fact it was not a plane or bird because we both saw it i am not sure what the hell it was....But i think it was the coolest thing i ever saw but i'm still freaked out about it cause i cant explain what happened...The time happened around 4  to 4:15 pm going above oral roberts university in tulsa we live in jenks which is across riverside from tulsa but we saw it up close and personal whatever it was. my reaction was what the beep was that ? i was like its time to go inside. like i said i wasn't to sure who i could tell this to or whatever but this is the first time i kinda did get excited about something i never thought would be possible to ever see because in fact i never believed in that kinda stuff except in movies. but thanks for listening to me.

*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg.
content.summary: Strobe like blinking form

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom at home waiting for my wife and kids to get back home.  my son ran inside and told me to come look at this thing in the sky.  i stepped out onto the front porch steps and there was a black triangle floating over our house and the tree tops.  it had 3 round white lights before each tip.  it was massive.  no noise.  just a vibration in my chest.  i ran inside to get a video camera and when i returned outside my hands would not work the camera.  i was just fixated on the triangle.  it hovered and moved very slow. it slowly moved over the trees and toward the east out of sight.  i really dont remember it leaving. just remember it wasnt there anymore. after my family went inside i stood outside with my digital camera in case it came back. two low flying black helicopters with flashing lights flew over my house followed by two planes.  i flashed the planes with my camera and one turned around and flew over my house again.  i remember feeling sad when the triangle was gone. i wanted to be close to it.  like i missed it.
content.summary: Triangel shape ufo with 3 lights hovers over the house and trees.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was leaving world gym off south cobb drive at approx 1815.  i was on atlanta road waiting in traffic to get onto 285.  im facing the atlanta downtown skyline and i notice a huge lit oval shape which was moving very slowly. it appeared to have a cigar shaped object in the center of the light. the reason i know it was moving because i was sitting still waiting to take a left onto 285 and in my field of view were a few sky scrappers.  it was slowly moving left to right across my field of vision.  i observed this object for approx 2-3 mins. also during that time there were several civilian jet liners and helicopters in my field of view and they were dwarfed.  when i 1st observed it i said to myself thats a really bright blimp, then after a few seconds of watching it i concluded that i did not believe it was a blimp anymore. i lost sight of the object because i was in traffic and had to take a left onto 285.  there are a lot of sporting events this weekend so i guess it still couldve been a blimp, but i thought i should report this after acouple days of thinking about it.
content.summary: Bright oval light  with cigar shape in the middle moving very slow and quite big

content.detailedDescription:
I was thinking about going to the po boy festival today and so checked the french quarter cam at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) to see what the weather was like.  there was a large object floating in the sky just beyond rampart st.  at first i thought the cam was malfunctioning and was somehow "freezing" the picture.  i thought that perhaps it was a helicopter frozen in flight, but then i could see cars moving along rampart.  you know how it is...I just sat there and stared at the screen.  the thing must have been making some movement because sometimes i could see light glint off of it.  after a few minutes, i realized that there was more than one stationary object in the sky, but they were much farther off.  i went to the mississippi bridge cam to see if i could see more of them but there were none visible in that direction.  when i returned to the fq cam, the large object was gone and only one of the smaller (or farther) objects remained.  i just checked; it is still there: *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg). look to the right of the building on the left.  was the larger object the goodyear blimp?  this is a festival day in nola.  but how could it have disappeared so quickly?

i then went to mufon to see if anybody else had reported from nola and when nobody had, i decided to report in spite of not being there.
content.summary: Silvery flattened oval seen stationary 10 min over french quarter on fq cam; later disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Object was first spotted by son of homeowner. he was outside on porch facing west. 
i was inside house around 8 pm when homeowner called me outside to view object. i stopped long enough to grab small digital camera. when i got outside this object was just coming into view over the trees at the end of our drive. we live within 5 miles of a small airport. this object looked like it could have been a plane landing. the only thing was it was heading toward the ne and the airport is se from us. it was probably about 200 to 500 feet up. it was slowly descending as it continued over us at a quick speed.

once outside i ran down the drive with camera trying to turn it on and grab a quick shot. it was moving too fast to get any kind of focus on it. camera proved useless. the object i was now seeing, from i assume it's tail end, was a v or pointed front, with flaired end. there were three lights, one i believe was red. this happened quick. it may have been a boomerang shape, too dark to make a definite call on that. although the lights to me appeared to be on the back underside of object with the other (red) light in the middle of front underside. 

it moved over houses and trees the next street over, still slowly descending, then out of view. there were three of us who saw this object, and two of us jumped into our car and tried to get site of it up the road. we went about two miles but never again saw this object.

i do not think it was any military or local air plane, it was too quick and soundless. as i said it looked like it was landing. we live in the white mountains, and aside from that this place is called the grand bois du nord for a reason. there are trees everywhere. if this thing was coming down that quick in that direction we would have heard the crash.

i was going to report this last night but did not. was waiting to see if anyone else said anything about a strange craft.
content.summary: Boomerang ( v shaped) object with three lights moving sw to ne over us. no noise, quick, about the height of an aircraft coming in to land.

content.detailedDescription: My 8 year old was lying on the trampolene w/a friend when they saw the triangle hover over them. they came in and were jumping up and down screaming and told us about the ships. they said there were 4 of them in a rectangular shape that broke apart into individual ships. this happened right above them they said. they said that there was a bigger light that one of the ships went to, one went off south, one went east and the other hovered over them and eventually went off towards the back of the house where there is woods and a river. they heard a noise with it, they described it as a booping sound. they are totally believeable and very insitent that it happened. this would be the second time in 2 years we have seen something like this. another neighbor has seen something prior to this as well but will not report it for fear of ridicule.
content.summary: 4 ships silver and black with red lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in a pulled over car with a friend waiting for her daughter to emerge from a music lesson. time was approximately (within a minute or two) 6:05 pm. my friend and i were talking and she got a call on her cell phone and i was sitting in the passenger seat looking south.  a triangle shaped object suddenly came into view and flew east to west over the 4500 block of wisconsin avenue.  i saw it for approximately 10 seconds.  my friend did not see it.

it was flying low (lower than a helicopter we saw a minute or so later) and it had white or yellow lights all along it. the lights looked kind of bulb-like and reminded me of old fashioned christmas tree lights in shape and appearance.  the sighting was very quick and almost as soon as i thought "what was that" it had flown out of view.   there are many trees in the area and they blocked further view.

the object was flying smoothly and at about the speed of a helicopter. i was in a car with the windows shut, so i don't know if it made any sound.

the flying triangle definitely wasn't a helicopter or conventional plane. it was over an extremely busy street in rush hour and i hope others saw it and will report it.
content.summary: Triangle flying low over busy dc street

content.detailedDescription:
September 29, 2004 (date from pilot's logbook entry)

flying a piper cherokee pa-28-140, southbound, 100 knots, 10pm, 6500ft, west of santa rosa, over the pacific coast - had just looked west for jets, east for jets, south for jets, listening to oakland center.
all quiet. alone in the sky.

nothing near me and the cherokee was purring and the heater was, of course, toasting my right foot.

luminescent blue, a glowing rounded corner rectangle, maybe 5 ft x 8 ft x 2 ft thick at my 10 o'clock, flashing cross the mighty cherokee's nose and off out over the ocean to my 2 o'clock. 2-3 seconds total.

instinctually, i slammed the yoke forward and turned hard right.
at the same time i thought...
i just looked and there was nothing.
how could i could have missed a jet's landing light?
why is there a jet at 6500 feet traveling west here?
it's too late to "dive" out of the way, i'm going to get hit by turbulence no matter what.
i didn't get physically hit?
hey, if it's a landing light, how can i could still see it as it winked out over the ocean?
no noise, no wake turbulence, no nothing, except a pounding heart.

scoobie doo says "huh?"  this made no sense.

on first instinctual impression, a jet - then thinking about it, a meteor, a luminescent blue meteor? but, it didn't "get dim" from looking through a smoky trail, over the ocean, it just "winked out". making me think: no smoke trail. and it was blue, no sparks, no flames, looked symmetrical and had a smooth or maybe ribbed surface.

i couldn't really figure out how close it was - but, it appeared at my 10 o'clock and went over the ocean at about my 2 o'clock - and it was only visible for 2-3 seconds. so - it had to be darned close. if i had to guess, it passed across my nose, 50 to 80 ft in front of me.

weirdest thing i've seen.

i can't help thinking that some et teenager swiped the keys to the saucer when the parents were out and went out with his buddy's for a night of et style "cow tipping"......

btw: i was so shocked that i couldn't talk enough to call oakland center - zoa.......
content.summary: Luminescent blue, rounded rectangle almost hit airplane: night, 6500 ft

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway having a cigarette and looking at the stars and noticed that an airplane was coming in from the east and coming directly over (which is normal because i live about 2 miles from an airport) but thought it looked akward. instead of just the red flashing light it also looked like it had a white light on the front. as it came closer it seemed like a single cylindrical-shaped aircraft (because of the altitude i could only see the lights) and also seemed to rotate counter-clockwise but passed under a few stars which i could see between the two lights, showing me that it was actually two aircraft ( one distinctly being an airplane). as they went directly above me i watched the single white light circle the plane 1 1/2 times then quickly darted in front again, lead for a few seconds, then make a hard right turn and accelerate up and to the northwest before disappearing. i also noticed that the faint sound of the jet was all that i heard, not anything unusual like i would have expected, just the sound of a single aircraft. the object moved swiftly and fluidly and did not flash. i am very excited to have seen this as this is the fourth time in my life that i have seen a ufo and i hope to see more! also the airplane did not land here but kept going in the general direction towards seattle from lewiston.
content.summary: A single white light flew in front of a commercial airliner, circled, continued to lead, turned hard right and ascended quickly to northwest then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
2 bright lights at night at about 1000ft over the city vallejo, napa, solano county. slowly moving to east.  very clear below about 1000 to 1100ft overcast clouds. (pretty common weather in around north san francisco bay).

as i was driving east on hwy 37, past skaggs island, about 3-5 miles west of vallejo, i saw two bright, white lights in the sky.

at first, they appeared to be two landing lights from a larger airplane. i didn't pay too much attention to them, i just noted that it looked like an airplane, going in the same general direction as a "right downwind" for runway 6 at napa airport (kapc). if it was a private jet in the pattern, they'd be at ~1000 ft - and that's about what it looked like.

i did start to notice that the "airplane" seemed to be "downwind" longer than normal, as it didn't turn right, to base, as it should have done - so, i started watching it more closely.

maybe it was a helicopter? but, a helicopter doesn't have widely spaced "landing lights". maybe it was a helicopter with an advertising grid below, with 2 large lights? it seemed odd to me - and since i'd never seen a helicopter with a lighted advertising display, that would have to been pointed towards me so that the "directional" landing lights would stay a brightly white, from my viewpoint.

then, oddly, the two lights, that were level, seemed to bank and turn left (to my right, as it had seemed to be heading towards me).

what was odd, is that the two lights, didn't change in intensity, but moved at a relatively slow speed.

"landing lights", are "directional". if they aren't pointed at you, they, basically, go out.

i'm a licensed pilot with quite a bit of night flying experience - and being based up north of san francisco airport, you can watch the landing lights of the passenger jets take off at night and watch them wink out as the jet makes it's turn after takeoff.

so, when this "thing's" right side light seemed to drop, and it seemed to turn "left" (my right), back south(ish) towards central vallejo, it really stood out that the 2 lights didn't change in intensity at all. that would infer a non-directional light - and that wouldn't be on an airplane - as a non-directional light that bright, would blind the pilot's vision. then, as it seemed to still be at about 900-1000 ft, i saw a string of perfectly spaced and aligned 7-8 dimmer lights tying the two bright light together. it was dark, but, if it was a black triangle, these smaller lights would have been the "aft" lights. 

what was odd, and different from my first impression, was that the right side bright light stayed ~30 degrees lower than the upper left light (as if "it" was still banking) - but, the two lights stayed offset and the pair of bright lights (and the 7-8 dimmer lights connecting them) began obviously traveling east, at, i'd guess, at 40-50 mph. (as in def not 10-20 and def not 100) it wasn't turning anymore, it was traveling east over hwy 80 up the auto mall "valley" - still with the two lights offset in height.

i'd been watching it over the napa river bridge, through vallejo (on 37), past 6 flags amusement park.

i lost sight of it while taking the 37 / 80 west offramp. behind the overpass. i caught a brief glance of it looking backwards on 80 - then i couldn't see the 7-8 dimmer lights between the 2 bright lights, but traffic was a bit hectic there.

i took the first offramp and doubled back on admiral callaghan, i couldn't see it right away, but, about at the target store, caught a momentary glimpse of an extremely bright, lighted spot about 850 ft up on the valley ridge, behind a rocky outcropping.

later, looking at google earth,i'd guess that it was 100% on the way to the top of the hills (that night, i could see the outline of the ridgeline). the lighted spot was pure white, reflected light, and i couldn't see any particular point of light, just a very brightly lighted area 50 to 100 ft in diameter up near the ridge, behind the rock outcropping. there was only a single intense white reflected light and it lasted for under a minute. there was no smoke rising, eliminating a flare as a possible explanation.

i lost direct line of sight behind the auto dealers and when i got to the top of admiral callaghan, i couldn't see the light on the hill anymore.

i went down to auto mall parkway, turned right and kept looking up to find the lights again.

nothing.

in recreating my initial view, what i first had thought was "downwind" on rwy 6 at kapc, was wrong. the lights were over the northern edges of the town of vallejo, a few miles south of the airport, about inline with the napa / solano county borders.

i'm 100% sure of the 2 non-directional lights, the 7-8 dimmer lights and the slow speed, the altitude and the light on the hillside. no smoke, no flicker, no pulsation.

on january 4th, at about 6pm, i called the faa tower at kapc and asked the controller if they had had any other sighting reports on the 23rd. he didn't, and he checked with the controller on duty that night, and he didn't see anything, either. the lights would have been to the south of the tower, behind the controller's visual operating area (runways are north of the tower).

duration of observation, about 10 - 12 minutes.

if someone else describes a similar sighting, feel free to contact me.

if you were driving east on hwy 37 the day before christmas eve in the early eve, you probably saw it.
content.summary: 2 bright &7-8 dimmer lights - slow moving, black, disappeared w bright lite

content.detailedDescription: Was perfectly clear night with partial moon low in horizon. stars were clear and no clouds. had been outside walking from house to lake, multiple times , working on temporary water supply pump that had quit. as a quick background, have been a pilot since 15 years old,(fixed wing), and from 1987 to 1998 had trained, owned, and flew a bell jet-ranger helicopter with a federal part 135 certification. i know all my aircraft, military, commercial and civilian. i also studied celestial physics in college and have been an amateur astronomer since childhood. very aware of light configuration and appearance of landing lights at night. lights had a slight golden look. object was south of me moving from my right to left at an estimated distance of 5 miles max. there were no strobes or noise. size was approx 1/2 of a full moon diameter.It's speed was probably under 100mph. i have seen the iss 100 plus times and this was not it or even close, and the time made that impossible. i ran to the house to get binoculars,(15 seconds max). upon return, the object had vanished, and i have a clear view and no obstructions. moon was low in western sky but had not set yet. i scanned it's estimated path and it was gone, both by eye and with bino's. tonight i was doing the same routine and noticed the same object a little earlier, but it was lower in the horizon but obstructed by trees in the horizon and was unable to obtain picture or a good view. it remained visible for about a minute, but at a much greater distance, and about the same west to east path. definitely not a plane or satellite. it was difficult to determine if it was a fattened disk or cylinder, but it was large. much larger than any commercial aircraft.I experienced no fear, just wonder, and wanted to document it by picture and i have the perfect 14 mp high def camera with 35x optical zoom that just didn't care to be available, but would have if there was more time. this is the first time i have ever submitted a report of any kind. am well studied on the subject and keep abreast of the phenomena almost daily.As so many say,"the next time"! i may be contacted but have little to add. i will keep looking up. also there are no city lights that could have given any illusion. thanks.
content.summary: Two bright headlights with light extension on rt. side illuminated upwards moving west to east

content.detailedDescription: I looked up to look for orion in the night sky and then noticed about 15 individual objects in a tight cluster each with a slowly pulsating light. they were at a very high altitude and made no noise.
content.summary: About 15 lights flying together over anaheim and garden grove at exactly 10 p.M.

content.detailedDescription: me and my nephew were in the back yard,it was around 7:00 - 7:30 pm it was dark already by 5:14 pm,so  i was working out and joking around with my nephew having some laughs.All of a sodden he told me look! and he ran inside the house to turn off the backyard light but i thought he was trying to scare me,he came back and said what is that pointing to the sky.I looked and there it was a big  boomerang ufo no lights no noise moving kinda slow at a steady pace. i didn't stop looking at with a wow.My nephew ran inside the house to tell his mom she came out with her camcorder but it was just to far by that time when we fist saw it it was almost over our head .So she came out and also saw it but we thought that it was impossible to get in on camera because it was to far by that time.By the time everything was over we were feeling like did we just see that or what ... shocked!
content.summary: Boomerang ufo  big no noise no lights moving at a slow pace

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,
i am writing in about an incident that my wife and i witnessed today while driving home to maple grove from downtown minneapolis this afternoon. we are wondering if anyone else reported this. we were traveling on west 694 about 2 miles out from the 94 interchange when we spotted a large round object over maple grove.  it looked to be the area of rush creek golf course.  at first i thought it to be a hot air balloon but the closer we got the farther west it moved at incredible speed. (this when things got bizarre) we turned onto the 94 exit and then instantly turned off onto the weaver lake rd exit and came up to a red light. while waiting along with a number of other vehicles we could see the large round object (with no distinct features) had turned and traveled back east about 5 to 10 miles in less than a minute and was hovering over boston scientific complex, about a   mile to a  mile wnw clearly in view.  we were watching this in amazement when out of nowhere (right in front of us) a large black unmarked military style helicopter shows up and approaches the object. right as this is happening we got the green and turned left onto weaver lake rd. we made the left turn and noticed the helicopter had veered off to the right of the object. thinking as soon as we get to the top of the hill (not even a  of a mile) the object is going to be right there in front of us. the object had completely vanished. we traveled about a  of a mile down the road and could see it had traveled west about 5 miles in less than a minute. my next thought was it seemed to be over rush creek elementary.  i drove up to the school and had a great view for a long ways west. we saw the object but it had traveled as far west as we could see about another 5-10 miles. i proceeded to drive north on 101 until i got to county rd 30 and took a left. and it just may be coincidence, but right after we made the turn there was a trooper sitting off the side of the road. we did see the object again, but it was so far away there was no way we were going to get close to it. 
a few facts here;
no hot air balloon is going to travel 5-10 miles west and turn around and return east the same distance if not more in the matter of a minute or less.
there were a lot of people that saw this.  anyone traveling on west 694 at this time of day saw this.
hot air balloons cant travel distances this thing did. this thing could travel 5 to 10 miles in less than a minute. i called the police department at 7:30 to see if anyone reported anything on this but the dispatcher said she just started working at 5:00 and had not heard anything.
content.summary: Maple grove daylight  u.F.O sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving home when a low very bright object in the horizon caught my eye. i am so glad i chose to keep my camcorder in the car at all times and this is why!! event happened between 7:30pm and 7:45pm est.
object moving at a very low altitude, an airplane even passes above it to show how low this ufo was. the entire object glowed a bright gold color then while filming, suddenly lights up all red. 
it was very difficult to follow the object due to the whole object seemed to be flashing off and on. i believe it may have even morphed/changed shape towards the end. then the object completely is gone. i even scan the skies in infrared nightvision to try to find and it disappeared. no clouds and no trees in it's path of travel while filming. where did it go??
i know it sounds like right out of a sci fi movie but it happened. i filmed the object moving south to north (from canfield toward austintown).
no, this was not the iss, as confirmed by the nasa website. i've made a video proving this theory wrong. the iss had already passed over (north to south btw so not possible!!) at 6:30pm est. would have only been seen for a duration of 3 minutes
video can be seen on youtube with same title as short description

november 12, 2010
content.summary: Ufo glowing orb disappears on camera ohio

content.detailedDescription: Preforming my usual evening chores - taking care of my dogs. my father had just called and we began a conversation when my eye caught sight of an object that glowed a blue/white light which seamed to cause a halo around the object and also a v-shaped tail - no sound at all.
content.summary: Object flew east to west covering a distance of approx. three miles in 5 sec

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were at home on our back deck. we observed a large, very bright light moving from north to south over the northern section of hampton, va. two aircraft were in the vicinity but were much dimmer with strobing lights and appeared to be at a higher altitude. the aircraft were easily identifiable. the object we observed did not have strobe lights and the luminosity and intensity of the light did not correlate with aircraft landing lights (i am a retired nasa engineer). no sound was evident and it appeared to be at a lower altitude than the aircraft. we observed the light moving toward us for about 30 seconds at which time it instantly blinked out. no further lights were visible. we looked for signs of a moving object at the point it blinked out but none was observable. if it an aircraft which had turned off its landing lights we should have seen its strobes, particularly in the airspace it occupied which is relatively busy. the location of the sighting is near patrick henry airport in newport news, va, norfolk international airport in norfolk, va, and langley afb in hampton, va. what we observed was unusual, attention-getting, and has peaked our curiousity. we would like to know if others have reported this or if has been explained. one possible explanation would be that it was a stealth aircraft but, if so, it certainly should have had strobe lights on while operating in this airspace. in summary, this event was unusual enough that we felt it warranted reporting. we hope it is helpful to you. thank you.

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Observed very bright light, no strobe, quiet, blinked out

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on broadview road just coming up over the hill into seven hills, oh - driving about 35 mph. the sky was almost perfectly blue - no clouds and not hazy, and around 55 degrees outside, very calm. it was approximately 3:20pm est. as we were coming to the top of the hill my son and i noticed an object in the sky, in front of us and to the 'slight right' of the road we were on and it was very high in the atmosphere. we noticed it was stationary. we kept watching it waiting for it to move but it didn't. it stayed this way for a few minutes. we thought it may be a very large satellite. then it instantly traveled to the left (east) some distance to where it was- this freaked us out. it traveled there in literally a blink of an eye - instantly. there were planes in the distance but all of the planes looked like planes and "all the planes" had long trails behind them. what we saw was a 'shiny, metallic sphere' that made no trail when it instantly traveled to the east. within several seconds of the new location to the east... it vanished, just completely disappeared instantly. we were shocked and were looking all over the sky for it. it was gone. the whole experience was less then 6 minutes. i know what we saw was a ufo because nothing can be that high up staying stationary - being a very large metallic sphere, then instantly move that far to the east then vanish. we are shocked because we have never seen anything like this - ever!
content.summary: Sphere that looked the same as a drop of mercury

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the car with my g/f when i happened to look upwards and see a cone shaped object with a silvery bulbous end (the other seemed pointed, but partially transparent)the pointed end was the 'bottom'. the object was stationary- and didn't seem to move- the 'plastic wrap cone didn't even shift. there was no wind at the time, but being it looked to be about..... 500+ feet up, there should have been a breeze at that height, even a slight one. it appeared to be a silvery balloon wrapped in transparent plastic (or even a weather balloon), but it had no motion to it. it either had a bluish green tinge, or it was refracting the color of the sky thru the plastic wrap. 

my reaction was "hey! that's not a plane". and the usual curiosity.

i lost sight of the object because of our driving under trees, and my neck doesn't do 180's all that well. 

i am reporting this as an unidentified flying object, due to it was unidentifiable, it was flying, and it was an object. past that, it was not an airplane just from the shape and partial transparency of the bottom cone shape, and the silvery 'balloon' on top.
content.summary: Short, stationary bluish cone shaped object with shiny top

content.detailedDescription:
I want people to know this. my name is *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) im 25. been running **(business name deleted--cms/sg) in lebanon for 6 years. very interested in this subject, elated to finally be a part of it. 
i get to work at ten a.M. and do my normal routine. run the store. 
background: store is connected to others in stripmall fashion. to my right is another business (the owner i had come outside) and to that businesses right is another. (this is run by a manager like me)
both of these other people are women, above middle age and very grounded in "the real world"
so. here we go.
i like to connect with my customers. one such customers knew i would be interested in this so- i receive a call on my business phone and its (this woman/customer) she is driving country roads in bedminster (miles away 10-20min) and tells me she sees a ufo. i hurry out front and immediately see 3 planes with classic white plume-trails behind them. as i tell her i see nothing... i see it. this wasnt just an orb. it had form. small (very far away?) but the planes (farther away) were minuscule so i imagine it could be huge. i had to get witnesses. i ran to the business with the manager first. she came out and spotted it in seconds.. we both gawked as the object seemed to tip, casting the suns rays off it as though it were a mirror in the sky for a split second. then it travelled a bit, seeming slow until it actually looked like it investigated a passenger plane i mentioned earlier. yes. farther away. at this time the owner of the business in between ours (and her customers) came out as well.. many were older and had difficulty fighting with the sun (it was crystal clear in good ole jerz today)to see it. one woman saw it, said "i dunno i think your all smoking too much lsd" and went inside. the other customers saw it but didnt find it interesting enough to stay and watch. (this is funny- one woman said "its a balloon! a weather balloon.....Object disappears and reappears miles away in front of all of us....."oh wait".. she finishes her thought with an entirely new opinion) 
so thats it. what we witnessed was a shiny or gleaming object fly around above hunterdon county. it flickered in an out of existence, it tilted and tumbled, had depth (3d object), travelled, came close enough (it looked like) to a passenger plane that the passengers would have to be blind not to see it (they probably didnt). 
and this whole event would have gone unnoticed if it were not for my customer 20 minutes driving distance away having seen it and calling my attention to it.

what i am wondering is this: two points of sight on one object in the sky... is this triangulate-able? could someone with the skill be able to figure out exactly where it was (how high + distance travelled) if i was able to show him or her where i was and where this woman was when we saw it?? i dont claim to know what this was. i do know what it wasn't. i have been studying the sky and the things in it for years. and my father is a military buff, especially when it comes to aeronautics, so i at least know something. "ha"  im glad i got this out here tonight because i cant wait for the "commonplace explanation" that will surely be given to this object somewhere in the media possibly tomorrow.
so there u have it.
 i have witnesses (3 not counting myself) from two separate places miles apart, on a crystal clear day (u couldnt even see pennsylvania the air was so clean >:) 
i would like everyone to know at least that i have gone from someone who truely believes, to someone who knows belief isnt necessary anymore.


ps. i asked everyone the same question. "have u ever seen anything like this in your life? anything even similar?"
the answer was a unanimous "no"
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cone,   Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Ufo was seen very clearly cloaking, uncloaking by 1 business owner and 2 managers of other small businesses.
